sense.gloss: to think (about, of), to think over, to ponder, to contemplate, to reflect (on), to meditate (on)
to consider, to bear in mind, to allow for, to take into consideration
to think (that), to believe, to hold (a view), to judge, to conclude, to suspect
to intend (to do), to think of (doing), to plan
to predict, to anticipate, to expect, to imagine
to come up with, to think up, to contrive, to devise
to consider (as), to regard (as), to look on (as), to take, to view
plan, device, idea, design, contrivance, conception, invention
study (of), discussion, discourse, inquiry, research article, academic paper
to reconsider, to rethink, to reassess
investigation into historical evidence, study of historical artifacts
to think out, to devise, to invent, to begin to think, to come up with a plan
if you think about it, come to think of it
careful consideration, deliberation, thinking over carefully
something to think about, one's thoughts, concern, worry
thinking about something, being absorbed in one's thoughts
something that requires thought, something that should be thought over carefully, something questionable
to be conceivable that, to be thinkable that

sdata.j: ↑僕↑↓ぼく↓が↑最後↑↓さいご↓に↑自分↑↓じぶん↓の↑考↑↓かんが↓えを↑伝↑↓つた↓えた↑人↑↓ひと↓は、↑僕↑↓ぼく↓を↑気違↑↓きちが↓いだと↑思↑↓おも↓ったようだ。
sdata.e: The last person I told my idea to thought I was nuts.

sdata.j: ↑最悪↑↓さいあく↓の↑場合↑↓ばあい↓を↑考↑↓かんが↓えておこう。
sdata.e: Let's consider the worst that could happen.

sdata.j: ↑行↑↓い↓き↑過↑↓す↓ぎたものであっても、↑僕↑↓ぼく↓は↑自分↑↓じぶん↓の↑考↑↓かんが↓えをなくしたくない。
sdata.e: I don't want to lose my ideas, even though some of them are a bit extreme.

sdata.j: これ↑以上↑↓いじょう↓↑考↑↓かんが↓えても↑無駄↑↓むだ↓だ。
sdata.e: It's useless to keep on thinking any more.

sdata.j: ↑最近↑↓さいきん↓↑考↑↓かんが↓えることが↑多↑↓おお↓↑過↑↓す↓ぎる。
sdata.e: I have too many things on my mind these days.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓らのコミュニケーションは↑我々↑↓われわれ↓が↑考↑↓かんが↓えてきたものよりはるかに↑複雑↑↓ふくざつ↓かもしれません。
sdata.e: Their communication may be much more complex than we thought.

sdata.j: いままで↑試↑↓ため↓してきた↑他↑↓ほか↓の↑政治↑↓せいじ↓↑形態↑↓けいたい↓を↑除↑↓のぞ↓いて↑考↑↓かんが↓えると、↑民主↑↓みんしゅ↓↑主義↑↓しゅぎ↓とは↑最低↑↓さいてい↓の↑政治↑↓せいじ↓↑形態↑↓けいたい↓だ。
sdata.e: Democracy is the worst form of government, except all the others that have been tried.

sdata.j: ↑良↑↓よ↓い↑考↑↓かんが↓えだね！
sdata.e: That's a good idea!

sdata.j: いい↑考↑↓かんが↓えですね。
sdata.e: That's a good idea!

sdata.j: 「あの↑音↑↓おと↓で↑考↑↓かんが↓え↑事↑↓ごと↓ができないわ」と、↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓はタイプライターを↑見↑↓み↓つめながら↑言↑↓い↓った。
sdata.e: I can't think with that noise, she said, as she stared at the typewriter.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓のチョコレートを↑食↑↓た↓べることを↑考↑↓かんが↓えさえしないで。
sdata.e: Don't you even think of eating my chocolate!

sdata.j: こんな↑馬鹿↑↓ばか↓げた↑考↑↓かんが↓えをどうやって↑思↑↓おも↓いついたんだ？
sdata.e: How did you come up with this crazy idea?

sdata.j: ↑考↑↓かんが↓えていることを↑聞↑↓き↓くな。やることを↑聞↑↓き↓け。
sdata.e: Don't ask what they think. Ask what they do.

sdata.j: なんで↑考↑↓かんが↓えを↑変↑↓か↓えたの？
sdata.e: What made you change your mind?

sdata.j: どうして↑考↑↓かんが↓えを↑改↑↓あらた↓めたのですか。
sdata.e: What made you change your mind?

sdata.j: ↑素晴↑↓すば↓らしい↑考↑↓かんが↓えを↑思↑↓おも↓いつくのは↑難↑↓むずか↓しい。
sdata.e: It's difficult to have great ideas.

sdata.j: これにつきまして、お↑考↑↓かんが↓えをお↑聞↑↓き↓かせ↑願↑↓ねが↓えればと↑存↑↓ぞん↓じます。
sdata.e: I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this matter.

sdata.j: きみは↑午前↑↓ごぜん↓↑中↑↓ちゅう↓ずっとこの↑問題↑↓もんだい↓について↑考↑↓かんが↓えてる。↑休憩↑↓きゅうけい↓しろ、お↑昼↑↓ひる↓を↑食↑↓た↓べに↑行↑↓い↓ってこい。
sdata.e: You have been thinking about this problem the whole morning. Take a break; go eat lunch.

sdata.j: ↑我々↑↓われわれ↓は↑友人↑↓ゆうじん↓のことを↑考↑↓かんが↓えねばなりません。
sdata.e: We must think about friends.

sdata.j: ↑我々↑↓われわれ↓は↑最悪↑↓さいあく↓の↑事態↑↓じたい↓を↑考↑↓かんが↓えておかなければいけない。
sdata.e: We have to expect the worst.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑年齢↑↓ねんれい↓を↑考慮↑↓こうりょ↓に↑入↑↓い↓れなければならない。
sdata.e: You must take his age into account.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑考↑↓かんが↓えに↑賛成↑↓さんせい↓ですかそれとも↑反対↑↓はんたい↓ですか。
sdata.e: Are you for or against his idea?

sdata.j: あなたは↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑考↑↓かんが↓えに↑賛成↑↓さんせい↓ですか、↑反対↑↓はんたい↓ですか。
sdata.e: Are you for or against his idea?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑若↑↓わか↓さを↑考慮↑↓こうりょ↓に↑入↑↓い↓れなければならない。
sdata.e: You must allow for his youth.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑経験↑↓けいけん↓↑不足↑↓ふそく↓を↑考慮↑↓こうりょ↓しなければならない。
sdata.e: You must make allowance for his lack of experience.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑自分↑↓じぶん↓がもはや↑若↑↓わか↓くないことを↑考慮↑↓こうりょ↓に↑入↑↓い↓れたほうがいい。
sdata.e: You had better take into consideration that you are no longer young.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑考↑↓かんが↓えを↑現実↑↓げんじつ↓と↑一致↑↓いっち↓させるべきだ。
sdata.e: You should make your ideas correspond with reality.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑何↑↓なに↓かほかのことを↑考↑↓かんが↓えているみたいだね。
sdata.e: You seem to be thinking of something else.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はどんな↑仕事↑↓しごと↓をしたいのかをよく↑考↑↓かんが↓えねばならない。
sdata.e: You must consider what kind of work you want to do.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はその↑事実↑↓じじつ↓を↑考慮↑↓こうりょ↓に↑入↑↓い↓れる↑必要↑↓ひつよう↓はない。
sdata.e: You need not take account of the fact.
